data.title: English Teacher - Ostrava from Překladatelské centrum Presto
data.meta_description: View and apply to English Teacher - Ostrava from Překladatelské centrum Presto
data.text:
Presto Language School is looking for English teachers with native proficiency for in-person on site company courses (group and individual) for our clients in Ostrava, Czech Republic.

We expect:

- native-like proficiency (native or certified C2 level)

- experience in teaching

- teaching qualification (e.g. TEFL, CELTA) or/and university degree (e.g. Faculty of Education, Faculty of Arts)

- reliability, responsibility, flexibility and friendly personality

- communicative approach to teaching

- business license required (ŽL)

We offer:

- support - methodology department, online library, seminars, e-learning platform

- long-term cooperation

- schedule flexibility - log into our course offer system and choose as many courses based on time and location as you want!

- office in the center of Prague with a teacher's room, library and copy center, online library and teaching resources

If you feel you are the right candidate, please send us your CV.

Name of school: Language school PRESTO

Contact person: Mgr. Georgij Ivančenko

Phone: +420 777 457 586

Email: nabor@presto.cz

Address: Na Příkopě 31, Praha 1

Website: http://www.presto-skola.cz/cz/kariera

We are looking forward to our cooperation!
